doc:
Leo Gordon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leo_Gordon 0 Leo Vincent Gordon (December 2, 1922 – December 26, 2000) was an American film and television character actor as well as a screenplay writer and novelist. During more than 40 years in film and television he was most frequently cast as a supporting actor playing brutish bad guys but occasionally played more sympathetic roles just as effectively. Leo_Vincent_Gordon ( December_2_,_1922 – December_26_,_2000 ) was an_American_film_and_television_character_actor as_well as a_screenplay_writer_and_novelist . During more_than_40_years in film_and_television he was_most_frequently_cast as a_supporting_actor playing brutish_bad_guys but occasionally_played more_sympathetic_roles just_as_effectively .
